full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DGYES PA RDO RJE'I PHYI DKYIL DANG LUS DKYIL GNYIS KYI DBANG GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BYIN GYIS CHAR RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES DPAL DGYES PA RDO RJE'I PHYI DKYIL DANG LUS DKYIL GNYIS KYI DBANG GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BYIN BRLAB CHAR RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI YONGS 'DZIN DAM @004A *, ,PA BLO BZANG CHOS GRUB KYIS BKA' BSKUL BA LTAR 'DOD CHAGS RDO RJE MING CING GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI 'DU BYED PA BLO BZANG DKON MCHOG GO , ,,)
